sentence: Inter Parfums, Inc. ( IPAR ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 28, 2019.
A cash dividend payment of $0.275 per share is scheduled to be paid on April 15, 2019.
Shareholders who purchased IPAR prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 30.95% increase over prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of IPAR was $76.52, representing a -5.52% decrease from the 52 week high of $80.99 and a 69.1% increase over the 52 week low of $45.25.
IPAR is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
IPAR's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $1.72.
Zacks Investment Research reports IPAR's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as 13.06%, compared to an industry average of 6.4%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the IPAR Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
